plugin.name: ðŸ“™ Note Helpers
plugin.description: Commands to help manage NotePlan notes
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark

plugin.commands.name: it
plugin.commands.description: Choose a Template to apply to an existing Note

plugin.commands.name: nn
plugin.commands.description: Create new note with title, in chosen folder with optional template, and optional current text selection

plugin.commands.name: mn
plugin.commands.description: Moves the currently opened (non-calendar) note to a folder you select

plugin.commands.name: jh
plugin.commands.description: Jumps to the heading that the user selects. (Currently only works in main window.)

plugin.commands.name: jd
plugin.commands.description: Jump to the ## Done section. (Currently only works in main window.)
